thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com | 4 of 334
thread.title: Edmund
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Edmund

author: Edmund
title: Edmund
text:
Ive ordered 3 products from North Shore, it appears the quality is excellent, however it is a little to early for us to judge the overall quality of all the products ordered. There is a problem with the Supreme Wipes we ordered,
The opening where the wipes are dispensed came unglued on one package, also the attachment of one wipe to another is flawed. In the one package of 50 wipes, there was approx. 6 to 8 wipes, where the next wipe was not attached. Nothing to do with the quality of the wipe, but the assembly and dispense process.
As I use, and note /rate, the other 2 products I ordered, I will gladly write a review, Some of the products we ordered, were not yet used.
Thank you.
